Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Relates to the assessment of certain residential cooperative, condominium and rental property
Summary: Provides that the assessment of residential cooperatives, condominiums and rental property shall not apply to certain condominiums unless such condominiums are participating in an affordable housing tax credit program or has a regulatory agreement.
LawCode: Amd ยง581, RPT L; amd ยง339-y, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the real property law, in relation to the assessment of certain residential cooperative, condominium and rental property
